statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 10 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 32 \\ 6 \\ 10 \\ -24 \\ -34 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ -14 \\ -18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -24 \\ -5 \\ -7 \\ 16 \\ 23 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
